hints.label: thm-c4-regularity
hints.title: C⁴ Regularity of Fitness Potential (Simplified Position-Dependent Model)
hints.content:
862: :label: thm-c4-regularity
863: 
864: **Scope**: This theorem applies to the simplified fitness model where $d: \mathcal{X} \to \mathbb{R}$ depends only on walker position (see Warning {ref}`warn-scope-simplified-model`).
865: 
866: Under Assumptions {prf:ref}`assump-c4-measurement`, {prf:ref}`assump-c4-kernel`, {prf:ref}`assump-c4-rescale`, and {prf:ref}`assump-c4-regularized-std`,
867: the fitness potential $V_{\text{fit}}[f_k, \rho](x_i) = g_A(Z_\rho[f_k, d, x_i])$ is C⁴ with:
868: 
869: $$
870: \|\nabla^4_{x_i} V_{\text{fit}}\| \le K_{V,4}(\rho) < \infty
871: 
872: $$
873: 
874: for all $k \in \{1, \ldots, N\}$ and $N \ge 1$, where:
875: 
876: $$
877: \boxed{
878: \begin{align}
879: K_{V,4}(\rho) := \,&L_{g^{(4)}_A} \cdot (K_{Z,1}(\rho))^4 + 6 L_{g'''_A} \cdot (K_{Z,1}(\rho))^2 \cdot K_{Z,2}(\rho) \\
880: &+ 3 L_{g''_A} \cdot (K_{Z,2}(\rho))^2 + 4 L_{g''_A} \cdot K_{Z,1}(\rho) \cdot K_{Z,3}(\rho) + L_{g'_A} \cdot K_{Z,4}(\rho)
881: \end{align}
882: }
883: 
884: $$
hints.raw_directive:
859: ## 8. Main C⁴ Regularity Theorem
860: 
861: :::{prf:theorem} C⁴ Regularity of Fitness Potential (Simplified Position-Dependent Model)
862: :label: thm-c4-regularity
863: 
864: **Scope**: This theorem applies to the simplified fitness model where $d: \mathcal{X} \to \mathbb{R}$ depends only on walker position (see Warning {ref}`warn-scope-simplified-model`).
865: 
866: Under Assumptions {prf:ref}`assump-c4-measurement`, {prf:ref}`assump-c4-kernel`, {prf:ref}`assump-c4-rescale`, and {prf:ref}`assump-c4-regularized-std`,
867: the fitness potential $V_{\text{fit}}[f_k, \rho](x_i) = g_A(Z_\rho[f_k, d, x_i])$ is C⁴ with:
868: 
869: $$
870: \|\nabla^4_{x_i} V_{\text{fit}}\| \le K_{V,4}(\rho) < \infty
871: 
872: $$
873: 
874: for all $k \in \{1, \ldots, N\}$ and $N \ge 1$, where:
875: 
876: $$
877: \boxed{
878: \begin{align}
879: K_{V,4}(\rho) := \,&L_{g^{(4)}_A} \cdot (K_{Z,1}(\rho))^4 + 6 L_{g'''_A} \cdot (K_{Z,1}(\rho))^2 \cdot K_{Z,2}(\rho) \\
880: &+ 3 L_{g''_A} \cdot (K_{Z,2}(\rho))^2 + 4 L_{g''_A} \cdot K_{Z,1}(\rho) \cdot K_{Z,3}(\rho) + L_{g'_A} \cdot K_{Z,4}(\rho)
881: \end{align}
882: }
883: 
884: $$
885:

hints.label: proof-thm-c4-regularity
hints.content:
890: :label: proof-thm-c4-regularity
891: 
892: **Step 1:** Apply fourth-order chain rule (Faà di Bruno formula) to $V_{\text{fit}} = g_A \circ Z_\rho$.
893: 
894: **Step 2:** Bound each of the 5 terms using assumptions on $g_A$ and bounds on $Z_\rho$ derivatives.
895: 
896: **Step 3:** All $K_{Z,m}(\rho)$ bounds are k-uniform via telescoping identities.
897: 
898: **Step 4:** Continuity follows from composition of continuous functions.
hints.raw_directive:
887: :::
888: 
889: :::{prf:proof}
890: :label: proof-thm-c4-regularity
891: 
892: **Step 1:** Apply fourth-order chain rule (Faà di Bruno formula) to $V_{\text{fit}} = g_A \circ Z_\rho$.
893: 
894: **Step 2:** Bound each of the 5 terms using assumptions on $g_A$ and bounds on $Z_\rho$ derivatives.
895: 
896: **Step 3:** All $K_{Z,m}(\rho)$ bounds are k-uniform via telescoping identities.
897: 
898: **Step 4:** Continuity follows from composition of continuous functions.
899:
